entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1 except 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 1 except 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
